data.title: Tenerife Sur Airport
data.meta_description: Tenerife Sur Airport is a large airport in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain. The airport is located at latitude 28.04450 and longitude -16.57250. The airport has one runway: 7/25.
data.text:
Tenerife Sur Airport is a large airport in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain. The airport is located at latitude 28.04450 and longitude -16.57250. The airport has one runway: 7/25. The ICAO airport code of this field is GCTS. The airport's IATA code is TFS. Nearby other airfields are Tenerife Norte-Ciudad de La Laguna Airport, La Gomera Airport, El Berriel Aeroc Airport, Gran Canaria Airport and El Hierro Airport.

Tenerife Sur Airport publishes a METAR. The flight information region (FIR) is Canarias.

Tenerife Sur Airport is in the timezone of Atlantic/Canary. Difference with UTC is +1 h. Today the sun rises at 07:34 and sets at 20:48. This applies to Tenerife Sur Airport, the universal daylight period may be different. The difference between the local time and UTC is +1 hour. Daylight saving time is currently in progress.

Things to do at this airport

Flying lessons are available at this airport. You can book a flying lesson without any prior experience. The most booked type of flying lesson at Tenerife Sur Airport is Basic flying lesson. The price of these lessons start at â‚¬ 239. Read more about Basic flying lesson here. You can also make your booking on this website.
